posts.name: ay
posts.cooked: About part b, I could not figure out how to make it understand if the password contains the birth year. And no I have not checked it what should I do?

posts.name: ay
posts.cooked: It is a graded assignment yes.

posts.name: connor.worley
posts.cooked: I would ask your teacher if they can sit down and help you with specific points you aren’t getting. Asking for code over the internet will probably not go over well and could be considered academically dishonest at worst. The most I can offer for part b is that you Google about “substrings.”

posts.name: GaryVoshol
posts.cooked: This forum deals with robotics, specifically FIRST Robotics.  While robots can be programmed with python, this question is not pertinent to that.  Closing the thread.

suggested_topics.title: Phoenix Pro Seasonal Pass Confusion
suggested_topics.excerpt: The license is attached to the account that bought the Season Pass. You have to login to Tuner X with that account to apply the licenses

suggested_topics.title: Feedforward calculations using WPILIB updates
suggested_topics.excerpt: Use ElevatorFeedforward.calculateWithVelocities(double currentVelocity, double nextVelocity) with a motion profile. package frc.robot; import edu.wpi.first.math.controller.PIDController; import edu…

suggested_topics.title: YAGSL Swerve help
suggested_topics.excerpt: I managed to get it working, thanks for all your help. The rio wasn’t updating code properly and it was using old values. That along with some PID tuning did the trick.
